articles.title: Reception given at Russian consulate general
Reunification of Korea supported
Koizumi's projected junket to S. Korea protested
articles.content:
Reunification of Korea supported 
    Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Chavalit Yongchaiyudh, deputy prime minister and minister of defence of Thailand who is also head of the New Aspiration Party of Thailand, when meeting with DPRK ambassador Jo In Chol to that country on October 9, wished the Korean people great success in their efforts to build a prosperous and powerful nation and achieve peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and the reunification of the country.
 He said that his party sincerely congratulated the Workers' Party of Korea on its shining successes made in the endeavours for the country's prosperity and development and national reunification under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.    
 Noting that it would contribute to the development of the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries to boost the relations between the WPK and his party, he said that his party would more closely cooperate with the WPK to this end.

articles.content:
Research into acacia intensified 
    Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- An acacia research room has been set up at the institute of forests of economic value of the academy of forestry.
 Its objective is to conduct scientific researches into raising good species of fast growing acacia of economic value and perfecting methods of their cultivation.    
 Its efforts focus on solving the problem of firewood, feed and furniture material and doing bee-farming in a big way.

articles.title: Greetings to Spanish King
Gift to leader Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Greetings to Spanish King 
    Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- President Kim Yong Nam of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly sent a message of greetings to Spanish King Juan Carlos Borbon on Oct. 12 on the occasion of the National Day of Spain.
 Extending warm congratulations to the King and people of Spain on its National Day, the message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would develop in various fields.    
 It wished the King success in his work.
